mapper.select: select count(*) as count from mating
select MAT_VIEWS from mating where MAT_NUM=#{value}

select ma.MAT_NUM, MAX(ma.MAT_VIEWS) as MAT_VIEWS, MAX(ma.MAT_CRE)as MAT_CRE, MAX(ma.MAT_TITLE)as MAT_TITLE, MAX(ma.MAT_CONTENT)as MAT_CONTENT, MAX(ma.MAT_SPEC)as matSpec, MAX(ma.MAT_TYPE)as MAT_TYPE, MAX(ma.MAT_GEN)as MAT_GEN, MAX(ma.MEM_NUM)as MEM_NUM, MAX(fi.FILE_NAME)as FILE_NAME, MAX(me.MEM_NAME)as MEM_NAME, MAX(me.MEM_EMAIL)as MEM_EMAIL, MAX(me.MEM_IMG)as MEM_IMG from mating ma left outer join files fi on ma.MAT_NUM = fi.MAT_NUM left outer join member me on ma.MEM_NUM = me.MEM_NUM where MAT_SPEC = #{filter_id} group by ma.MAT_NUM order by ma.MAT_NUM desc limit #{startIndex}, #{length}
select count(*) as count from mating where MAT_SPEC = #{filter_id}
select FILE_NAME ,width, height from Files where FILE_NAME = #{filename}
select * from mating order by MAT_NUM desc limit #{startIndex}, 4
select MAT_NUM, MAT_VIEWS, MAT_CRE, MAT_TITLE, MAT_CONTENT, MAT_SPEC, MAT_TYPE, MAT_GEN, MAT_COST, MEM_NUM from mating where MAT_NUM=#{matNo}
